---
name: Bug Report
about: Report a bug in any of the SCION endhost SDK components
title: "bug/[component]: [short description]"
labels: "bug"
---

Please completely fill in the following template. If you are not sure about some
parts, please provide as much information as possible.

## Environment

**Version:** e.g., `scion-stack v0.1.0`, `pocketscion v0.3.1`
**Operating System:** e.g., `Ubuntu 24.04`, `macOS 15.1`

## Describe the bug

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## How to reproduce

Steps to reproduce the behavior, ideally with a minimal code example.

## Expected behavior

A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen.

## Observed behavior

A clear and concise description of what actually happened, including any error messages.

## Additional context

Add any other context about the problem here, such as relevant configuration files, network setup,
logs or screenshots.
